page.title: 17BISHOPS CASTLE POLICEMAN
page.content:
One day we interviewed a policeman.His name was P.C.Lewis.He is part of the West Mercia Constabulary.He has only been in Bishops Castle since January.
When they arrest people for stealing cars you are arrested on suspicion of stealing a motor vehicle.After they arrest them they take them to Ludlow police station.Anything they say is taken down as evidence.
This year they have arrested 4 people for assault,2 people for criminal damage and two for stealing.They have had four burglarys but no robberies. The two policeman went on picket duty during the miners strike.
They do go to football matches usually in Shrewsbury.
